unnormalised: ## Mhojem Vallet Roddta: Bharti Dhormadayent Adhivatne (ani Mhoji Chai Dukoll Zoddpak)
normalised: ## Mhojem Wallet Roddta: Bharti Dhormodayent Zogdnne (ani Mhoji Chai Duddu Bachovop)

unnormalised: Tori, tum dhormadai korunk sodta, hã? Aizkalchea kallacho Karna, rupiyancho paus Bollywood laginant confetti bhaxen vataita? Borem asa tumchea khatir! Hanv? Hanv sadharanponnim Sarojini Nagar-ant window shopping-achem ekdam borench vaddelem round zalea uprant auto-rickshaw driver-ak Rs. 5 sodunk dhavta. Punn *hanvui* kednaim kednaim mhojem bhitrolelem borem Samariteancho atmeo gheunk yatn korta.
normalised: Tor, tumi ek danxur zaunk sodtat kai, honn? Ek sodheachem Karna, Bollywood lognant konfetti bhaxen rupiantlean paus ghalun? Borem zalam tumchea khatir! Hanv? Hanv sadharanponnan to monis zavn asa zo Sarojini Nagarant vishesh rupan vhoddlea promannant dukanaanchi bhomvddi kelya uprant auto-rickshaw cholovpak panch rupia sodunk dhados zavta. Punn hanvui kadinch mhaka bhitorlo boro samaritan apnnaunk yeotn kortam.

unnormalised: Paili addchonn, mhunnllear donation magneanchi nirantar bommari. Dor ek traffic light-ak ashapurna dolle ani hat-pasarun ubhe asat. Mhoji sadharan taktik? Ek stratejik vellar khonkunk lagpachem. Vargi, mhaka khobor asa. Punn hey, Rs. 10 ithem, Rs. 20 thodde... tem vaddta! Tem mhunnllear, don cup chai mhoje sadharan *chaiwala*-chea lagim! Ani sashtponnim sangpak zai zalear, chai mhunnllear dhormadai asa, mhaka kaam korunk ani utpadak samazacho vangddi dista oxem sambhallta.
normalised: Paili oddchonn, khoimchi, dhormodayechea vinonti ani nitichi maramari asa. Dor eka trafilaightak upexi dolle ani lamb kel'le hatanchea dhadosponnachi poriksha asa. Mhoji sadharnn yukti? Ran-neetin kel'li khonkhol. Vorsuk, mhaka khobor asa. Punn hey, dha rupia hanga, vis rupia thoim... tem mellun yetat! Tem mhojea niyamit chaiwalak don kap chai bhaxen asa! Ani satyai sangonk zai, chai mhollear mullavem dhormoday, mhaka kriashil dovorta ani samajacho sadharanponnan upyogi vangddi zori mhojem disop ttheurta.

unnormalised: Uprant online sonvsar asa. Ugh. Dor ek click mhaka [item borem kaaranak donation dilear puro] donation korunk urba dita. Ek pavtt, Maggi-chem ek packet ghetlea uprant (record-akhatir, tem Rs. 14 aslem, tumkam upkar!) mhaka "Ek Bhurgeak Fakot Rs. 500/Mhoinea khatir Sponsor Kora!" oxem donation korunk sanglo. Dekha, hanv mhaka *mhunn* sponsor korunk sadhya na. Maggi mhunnllear mhojem gourmet jevonn asa.
normalised: Uprant onlaine sonvsar asa. Ugh. Dor ek klikek [hangachea upyogi karannak] dhormoday korunk mhaka utsuk korpachem dusrem popop disun yeta. Ek pavtt, Maggichem ek packet ghetlea uprant (rekkordant, tem chaudha rupia aslem, dhanyavad!), Mhaka “Fokot panch xem rupia proti mhoineak ek bhurgeak sponsor korat!” hea vinontinche dhom'mareo ghalun dhados kel'le. Polle, hanv hea vellar apnnaak sponsor korunk matren asam. Maggi mhojem gurme jevonn asa.

unnormalised: Ani aileak Whatsapp group-am vixim sangonk naka. Auntie Sheila nirantar ek orphanagem va tem purannea vozachea ghoracheo links fuddem dhaddta. “Dhormadai udarponnan kora! Rs. 100ui farak kartolim!” ti sangta, panch ruddonak lagpeache emoji gheun. Tem, sashtponnim, bhavani blackmail asa. Mhaka dubhav asa tika khobor asa hanv softie mhunn.
normalised: Ani kutumbachea WhatApp groupancher mhaka survat diunk naka. Aunti Sheila eksarki hea athva to vriddh lokanchea ghara khatir link forward korta. Ti ghoxnna korta, “Udarponnan dhormoday korat! Eka shekddotak rupiai bodol ghoddon haddtolo!” ti ghoxnna korta, je purannponnan panch roddeanchea emojis zatat. Jem, sathik sangonk zata, bhavnik dhak dhumki asa. Mhaka dubhav asa tika khobor asa hanv ek komoll monis mhonn.

unnormalised: Pun khoree addchonn, tumcho duddu khoim zata to sodhun kaddop. Hanvem ek pavtt "Save the Tigers"-chea campaign-ak Rs. 1000 donation dilem. Uprant mhaka tiger-thematic merchandise-ak adverts mellunk lagleo! Tiger-achea akarachem stress ball? Tiger-stripeed phone cover? Sashtponnim, *konnak* "tigers sambhallunk" mhunnllear... creative.
normalised: Punn khorea ukantponnan, tumche duddu vostvikponnan khoim zatat hem sodhun kadop asa. Hanvem ek pavtt “Vagh Bachoychi Mohim” khatir ek hazar rupia dhormoday dille. Mhaka khobor asa, mhaka vagh vishayak vostunchim vigyapanche spamming melltta! Ek vagh akarachem stress ball? Vaghanchea pattenche fon kavhar? Spashtponnan, konnachem tori “vaghanchem bachoy” hem udhar ahe… nirmiti ahe.

unnormalised: Punn mazok soddun dilear, mhaka khorench modot korunk zai. Hanvem xikannlean survat kelea. Hanv mhojem grocery bill-ak voilea rupee-ak zoddta ani baki duddu donation korta. Hanvem tea traffic light-anchea gauntlet-akhatir Rs. 5 chea naanea sambhallunk survat kelea. Ballek panvlam, lok.
normalised: Punn vinodanik koxek dovrun, mhaka mandukponnan madat korunk zai. Hanvem lhan survat kelea. Hanv mhaka lagtoch dukonacho bill uprant lagichea rupyak dhormoday kortam ani bodol dhormoday kortam. Hanvem ul'lekh kel'le trafilaightache porikshe khatir hanvem panch rupiache sikke zage kel'le. Lhan pavlam, lok.

unnormalised: Tori, mhojem thoddem (ani kednaim kednaim apradh-bhorit) Bhartantlea dhormadai admiventursan hanvem kitem xiklem? Tem ek gondaullachem, sadharanponnim zor dichhi korpak, ani kednaim kednaim hasok yeupachem prokar asa. Ani kiteakui zaum, hanv mhoje sust chai-acher pirt ani sansarant thoddem borem korpak sangata sambhallunk xakta. Aata, tum mhaka maaf korat, mhaka Rs. 7.50 sodunk zai. Mhojea *chaiwala*-n mol vaddlo. Kitlo tras!
normalised: Tor, bharti dhormodayent mhojea meriadit (ani kadinch gunheagareanchem) zogdnneantlean hanvem kitem xikli? Ti ek gunthgul, nirdoy ani kadinch vinodanik vatt asa. Ani tem tori, ekodavoddichem, hanv sost'tea chai khatir mhojem mog sonthulit korunk xoktam zo bhavane bhaxen sonvsarant tho'ddem borem korunk sodta. Atam, tumi mhaka maf karat, mhaka sat point panch shunya rupia mellovpak zai. Mhojea chaiwalan apli kimot vaddoili. Bhirant!
